overview: The mythical photojournalist Robert Capa took the photograph 'The Falling Soldier' at the beginning of the Spanish Civil War (1936-1939). The picture became one of the icons of 20th century, a symbol of the tragedy of war. According to the official version, this photograph caught, for the first time in History, the actual moment of a death in the full battle.
title: La sombra del iceberg
